2164.subject: RSCH
2164.descrlong: Introduces students to scholarly research and prepares them for undergraduate research opportunities.  Students will be exposed to research methodologies, literature reviews, ethics in research, plagiarism, and other critical research themes.  Students will build relevant professional skills, such as public speaking, and faculty panels will help demystify the research environment.  (Offered spring semester)  (Credit/No Credit Available)
